about_the_game:
Magnificent and high quality sound to your game.

Various events such as main theme, battle, tutorial, config screen, etc. are unified in the world of royal road RPG.

OGG and M4A with looping tags are available immediately with the tool.

***************************

OGG files: 16

M4A files: 16

***************************

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.

・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker

・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
